name: The Prince and the Adventurer
description:
On a night of heavy rain, a gigantic Lizard monster kidnaps the mouse Prince.

The rest of the Kingdom is ready to give up against the strenght of the monster, and accept that they can't avoid the inevitable.

All but an Outsider, who dashes sword in hand toward danger...

( My entry for the Narrative Driven Game Jam #3! )

-------

This game is a platformer.

Move with the Arrow Keys / WASD

Jump with Z / Mouse 0

Attack with X / Mouse 1

You can pause the game with Enter!

-------

CREDITS

Art and programming done by KaaSnake

Made in Unity

Music and SFX made with Bosca Ceoil by KaaSnake
